name: Devil's Race
description:
Play as a recently deceased race car driver that died in a horrific car accident. Luckily for you, the devil is a huge fan of racing and will give you a chance to race out of his dungeon. Drive fast, battle enemies, and select upgrades as you escape from the murky darkness following you close behind. Controls (You can rebind tho) MoveWASD, ⬆️ ⬇️⬅️➡️Pause/SettingsPMeleeSPACE Credits

Code, Art, Design - Nothing#3367
Art, Design - doodlenstein#6185
Audio - roobertαng#9589
